title: 旧约 - 历代记上(1 Chronicles) - 第 3 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 历代记上(1 Chronicles) -- 第 3 章 ( 本篇共有 29 章 )

lineList.en: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
lineList.cn: 大卫在希伯仑所生的儿子记在下面，长子暗嫩是耶斯列人亚希暖生的。次子但以利是迦密人亚比该生的。

lineList.en: The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
lineList.cn: 三子押沙龙是基述王达买的女儿玛迦生的。四子亚多尼雅是哈及生的。

lineList.en: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
lineList.cn: 五子示法提雅是亚比她生的。六子以特念是大卫的妻以格拉生的。

lineList.en: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
lineList.cn: 这六人都是大卫在希伯仑生的。大卫在希伯仑作王七年零六个月，在耶路撒冷作王三十三年。

lineList.en: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:
lineList.cn: 大卫在耶路撒冷所生的儿子是示米亚，朔吧，拿单，所罗门。这四人是亚米利的女儿拔书亚生的。

lineList.en: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
lineList.cn: 还有益辖，以利沙玛，以利法列，

lineList.en: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
lineList.cn: 挪迦，尼斐，雅非亚，

lineList.en: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
lineList.cn: 以利沙玛，以利雅大，以利法列，共九人。

lineList.en: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
lineList.cn: 这都是大卫的儿子，还有他们的妹子她玛，妃嫔的儿子不在其内。

lineList.en: And Solomon's son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
lineList.cn: 所罗门的儿子是罗波安。罗波安的儿子是亚比雅。亚比雅的儿子是亚撒。亚撒的儿子是约沙法。

lineList.en: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
lineList.cn: 约沙法的儿子是约兰。约兰的儿子是亚哈谢。亚哈谢的儿子是约阿施。

lineList.en: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
lineList.cn: 约阿施的儿子是亚玛谢。亚玛谢的儿子是亚撒利雅。亚撒利雅的儿子是约坦。

lineList.en: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
lineList.cn: 约坦的儿子是亚哈斯。亚哈斯的儿子是希西家。希西家的儿子是玛拿西。

lineList.en: Amon his son, Josiah his son.
lineList.cn: 玛拿西的儿子是亚们。亚们的儿子是约西亚。

lineList.en: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
lineList.cn: 约西亚的长子是约哈难，次子是约雅敬，三子是西底家，四子是沙龙。

lineList.en: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
lineList.cn: 约雅敬的儿子是耶哥尼雅和西底家。

lineList.en: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
lineList.cn: 耶哥尼雅被掳。他的儿子是撒拉铁，

lineList.en: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
lineList.cn: 玛基兰，毗大雅，示拿萨，耶加米，何沙玛，尼大比雅。

lineList.en: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
lineList.cn: 毗大雅的儿子是所罗巴伯，示每。所罗巴伯的儿子是米书兰，哈拿尼雅，他们的妹子名叫示罗密。

lineList.en: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.
lineList.cn: 米书兰的儿子是哈舒巴，阿黑，比利家，哈撒底，于沙希悉，共五人。

lineList.en: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
lineList.cn: 哈拿尼雅的儿子是毗拉提，耶筛亚。还有利法雅的众子，亚珥难的众子，俄巴底亚的众子，示迦尼的众子。

lineList.en: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
lineList.cn: 示迦尼的儿子是示玛雅。示玛雅的儿子是哈突，以甲，巴利亚，尼利雅，沙法，共六人。

lineList.en: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
lineList.cn: 尼利雅的儿子是以利约乃，希西家，亚斯利干，共三人。

lineList.en: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
lineList.cn: 以利约乃的儿子是何大雅，以利亚实，毗莱雅，阿谷，约哈难，第莱雅，阿拿尼，共七人。
